channel.title: 317 new rsps dev team! (must have skype)
channel.description:
(317 SERVER) BEFORE I SAY ANYTHING PLEASE READ THE BOTTOM. AND YOU MUST HAVE SKYPE. IF YOU DON'T YOU CAN'T BE ABLE TO JOIN. IF YOU THINK THATS MEAN IT'S BECAUSE WE'RE GONNA HAVE A TEAM MEETING..
Hi guys.. So I have recently been searching for a good team that I can join but I can't find anyone one of em (that are good).. What I want to do with you guys is make a team.. Not a big team but a team that we can rely on each other. FOR THE SOURCE we are going to get a source we would all agree on. I think that's the same with you guys too. (REQ ARE ON THE BOTTOM. Oh and overall everyone here will be owner.. That do favor..)
Host 0/1 (THE HOST WILL NEED A VPS AND HE WILL ALSO BE GETTING DONATIONS BECAUSE HE'S THE HOST. Coder 0/2 GFX 1/1 (me) Website 1/1 (me)
Req
Name: Optional (Not really important..) Skype: (NEEDED) Age: Optional (Don't care if your 8 or if your 40) Job: (NEEDED) Experience: Optional (As long as you know how to do it..)
One more thing.. Don't play stupid on me.. I hate it when people do that. IF YOU HAVE anymore questions I would love to answer them :). I will be checking everyday and I'm on skype everyday. Well hope you join. Cya :)
OH AND ONE MORE THING. WE WILL THINK OF A NAME TOO. AND IF YOU REALLY WANT A TEAM.. IDC WHY THIS IS BAD (NOT IF YOU DON'T HAVE SKYPE)

item.title: 317 new rsps dev team! (must have skype)
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

You are not allowed to request a hoster. It sounds like you can’t do anything server related tbh, so you should look into joining development teams who need website and gfx.

Read full topic
item.source: 317 new rsps dev team! (must have skype)
